sense.def:
Kadar ptica ali druga žival
pounces on something
, na nekaj skoči in tisto zagrabi.

seg.quote: He had seen leopards pouncing on young baboons.

sense.def:
To pounce on something
pomeni glasno opozoriti na nekaj, na primer na napako.

seg.quote: Local politicians are quick to pounce on any trouble.
